      • collectNestedClasses

        public static void collectNestedClasses(org.eclipse.jdt.core.IType t,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> classList)
                                 throws org.eclipse.jdt.core.JavaModelException
        Collects recursively nested classes in the compilation unit. The nested class names are type-qualified. The classes are stored in the class list given as argument. For example: 
              HEllo
      HEllo$C1
      HEllo$C1$C3
        Parameters:
        t - type representing a class
        classList - class list to store nested classes
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.jdt.core.JavaModelException
        See Also:
        IType.getTypeQualifiedName()

      • getInputStreams

        public static java.util.List<java.io.InputStream> getInputStreams(java.util.List<java.lang.String> classList,
                                                  java.lang.String[] classPath,
                                                  java.lang.String packageName)
        Returns the list of InputStreams for the given list of classes.
        Parameters:
        classList - list of classes
        classPath - classpath
        packageName - package name
        Returns:
        list if InputStreams

      • findClasses

        public static java.util.List<java.io.InputStream> findClasses(org.eclipse.jdt.core.ICompilationUnit unit,
                                              org.eclipse.jdt.core.IJavaProject jp)
        Returns the list of InputStreams for all classes defined in the compilation unit including nested classes.
        Parameters:

        jp - java project

        list if InputStreams
